title: JSON-RPC 2.0 Predefined Error Code
description: An error code from the predefined range reserved by the JSON-RPC 2.0 specification

anyOf.title: Parse error
anyOf.description: Invalid JSON was received by the server

anyOf.title: Invalid request
anyOf.description: The JSON sent is not a valid Request object

anyOf.title: Method not found
anyOf.description: The method does not exist / is not available
